#summary How to build Xixibase server?
#labels Phase-Implementation
==Building Xixibase server(after 0.6 version)==
===Windows 32bit:===
 # run build_win32.bat

===Windows 64bit:===
 # run build_win64.bat

===Linux/Mac/Freebsd 32bit:===
 # chmod +x build_32.sh
 # run ./build_32.sh

===Linux/Mac/Freebsd 64bit:===
 # chmod +x build_64.sh
 # run ./build_64.sh
